Mr.translation[0].definitions[0].definit: used before a man’s family name to be polite when you are speaking to him, writing to him, or talking about him
Mr.translation[0].definitions[1].definit: used when speaking to a man in an official position
Mr.translation[1].definitions[0].definit: a title used before a man’s family name when being polite
Mr.translation[1].definitions[0].example: Please can I speak to Mr Shultz?
Mr.translation[1].definitions[1].definit: a title used when addressing a man in an official position
